txt.en: 'I will tell you the story of how Corudan and I came to be here, [placeholder], but not just now. Let the tale wait until we are in the sunlight again. We have slain many Orcs to free these people, but the woods crawled with more of their kind and we should not tarry here.\n\n'Is Horn here with you?'
Many Orcs have returned to Burg-shápol, and you must defeat them!
'I cannot fight on! Curses upon you!'
Instance: The Missing
'This was a pleasant surprise, [placeholder]! Now let us return to town and see what tale Nona and Corudan have to share!'

'It is good to see you again, [placeholder]. We thought to find you in Edoras, but on the way we found an overturned waggon and sign of struggle, and thought to look for these folk. I am glad we did, for today we have saved some lives. These Orcs were ferocious. It is fortunate that most of the creatures were away when Nona and I entered the cave.'
Survive the return of the Orcs to Burg-shápol

'There will almost certainly be Orcs within this cave, [placeholder]. Remain on your guard, and let us move with haste! If the missing craftsmen are within, their captors may not keep them alive for long.'
Talk to Nona in Burg-shápol

'There will almost certainly be Orcs within this cave, [placeholder]. Remain on your guard, and let us move with haste! If the missing craftsmen are within, their captors may not keep them alive for long.'
Talk to Corudan in Burg-shápol

'I hear Orcs approaching, [placeholder], not from ahead of us but from behind!\n\n'I will stay here to delay their approach, but you should press on into the cave to see what has become of the missing craftsmen. Perhaps one of them has escaped and we have him to thank for the dead Orcs we have seen already, but even so they are all likely still in danger. Go, and quickly!'
You hear raised voices from further ahead, but cannot make out any of the words
You have found Burg-shápol, a cave in the Everholt where the missing craftsmen may be found.
'All of you stay behind us. Someone approaches, or some many!'
Horn is in the tunnels of Burg-shápol.
Horn is inside Burg-shápol, the cave in the Everholt where the missing craftsmen might be found.
Talk to Horn in Burg-shápol
Horn has stayed behind to delay the approach of the following Orcs, while you search the tunnels of Burg-shápol for the missing craftsmen.
Search Burg-shápol with Horn
Talk to Horn in Burg-shápol
Search Burg-shápol with Horn
'[placeholder]! Are you looking to free these folk?'
Search the tunnels of Burg-shápol for the missing craftsmen
'It seems Corudan and I have freed them first!'
'Horn, look out!'
Wait for Horn to return
Talk to Horn inside Burg-shápol
Horn has been defeated!
You have found Nona and Corudan in the depths of Burg-shápol.
Corudan is in the depths of Burg-shápol.
'This way, [placeholder], and hurry! The captured craftsmen may not have much time.'
'Look! Dead Orcs!'
This chamber contains more dead Orcs, but no sign of the missing craftsmen
'I cannot tell if these Orcs were slain by their own kind, or by some unknown friend.'
'Can you hear that?'
You have found a chamber of cages, and some old friends
'Press on, [placeholder]! I will delay any pursuit.'
'Nona!'
'I am sorry, my friends. I can fight no longer!'
'At last! I believe that was the end of them.'
